column5: Going to Lost Island in July with some other guys. Anybody know anything about the lodge or the july fishing? Thanks In Advance
you will like it there. good place.

The camp is really nice and they do upgrades every year, so everything is in good condition. The boats and motors are top notch and friendly staff. The fishing in July will be better for the bigger walleyes and they will be stacked on the reefs. If you want a guide, Basil is really good and a character or Brad is probably a better fisherman, but a little more quite in the boat. Have fun.
